about_the_game:
・Game Overview
This game is a simple 3D craft survival game. Starting with nothing, players collect materials, craft tools, build bases, defeat animals and enemies to obtain food and new resources, and embark on further adventures, creating a cycle of gameplay.

・Survival Mode with Proper Game Over:
In this game, the survival aspect follows the conventional "health decreases when hunger reaches zero" concept. With this in mind, we've intentionally balanced the game to create a sense of urgency, where if you let your guard down, you'll quickly face a game over. This is achieved by setting food acquisition frequency, spoilage rates, and hunger recovery at a challenging level. The "Survival Mode" is designed for users who are seeking a true survival experience.

・"Little +" Action Elements
While some craft survival games have simple combat with enemies, this game aims for "Little +" action elements. It incorporates features such as dodge rolls, lock-on functionality, combo attacks, and enhances the action aspect of the gameplay.

・Online Multiplayer Support
This game supports online multiplayer, allowing players to enjoy the experience with like-minded friends. (PvE only)

・Other Features
As a craft survival game, it includes my favorite elements, such as hunger management, cooking, resource gathering, hunting, tool and weapon crafting, and base building.

This game marks my first release in the open-world craft survival genre, which is why it is titled "MyFirstCraftSurvival." It's just as straightforward as it sounds.

In this game, the survival aspect follows the conventional "health decreases when hunger reaches zero" concept. With this in mind, we've intentionally balanced the game to create a sense of urgency, where if you let your guard down, you'll quickly face a game over. This is achieved by setting food acquisition frequency, spoilage rates, and hunger recovery at a challenging level. While some craft survival games have simple combat with enemies, this game aims for "Little +" action elements. It incorporates features such as dodge rolls, lock-on functionality, combo attacks, and enhances the action aspect of the gameplay.

・Other Features
As a craft survival game, it includes my favorite elements, such as hunger management, cooking, resource gathering, hunting, tool and weapon crafting, and base building.

name: My First Craft Survival

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows11
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: When I woke up, I found myself on an uninhabited island. And I had nothing with me! Anyway, the first priority is to find food to avoid starvation. At night, mysterious creatures attack, so I need to craft equipment and build a base to defend myself! In the end, there's a boss waiting for me!
